IControllerPersona.summary: Interface that define operation that you can do

remark.para: This interface define the next operation:

Read.summary: This method allow call gRPC for obtained an instance of a person if exist.
Read.param: specifies identificator for a person in database

ReadAll.summary: This method allow call gRPC and obtain all person existing into database if exist

Insert.summary: This method allow call gRPC for insert an instance of a person in database
Insert.param: Class that represent a message in protocol buffer

Update.summary: This method allow call gRPC for update an instance of a person in database
Update.param: Class that represent a message in protocol buffer

Delete.summary: This method allow call gRPC for delete an instance of a person in database
Delete.param: specifies identificator for a person in database

Byzantine.summary: This method allow call gRPC for make bizantine replica
